$request.getParameterValues('phenotype')) #if ($phenotype != '') #if ($isFirstPhenotype) #set ($isFirstPhenotype = false) #if ("$!request.phenotype_subterms" == 'no') #set ($query = ", ($query = $query.concat(" ${joinOperator} ? in phenotypeValue")) #end #set ($discard = $parameters.add($phenotype)) #end #end #if (!$isFirstPhenotype) #set ($query = $query.concat(')')) #end #set ($isFirstDisease = true) #set ($joinOperator = "$!{request.get('omim/join_mode').toUpperCase()}") #if ($joinOperator != 'AND' && $joinOperator != 'OR') #set ($joinOperator = 'AND') #end #foreach ($discard = $parameters.add($disease)) #end #end #if (!$isFirstDisease) #set ($query = $query.concat(')')) #end #if ("$!request.get('doc.creationDate/after')" != '') #set ($date =
